mapper.insert: insert into schedule values(schedule_Seq.nextval, #{contents}, to_date(#{start_Date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{end_Date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 3, #{title}, #{backgroundColor})
mapper.update: update schedule set contents=#{contents}, title=#{title}, start_Date= to_date(#{start_Date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), end_Date= to_date(#{end_Date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), backgroundColor=#{backgroundColor} where schedule_Seq=#{schedule_Seq}
